articles.title: NFL coach Urban Meyer was caught in a compromising position with a woman at a bar - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Married NFL coach Urban Meyer was caught on camera dancing with another woman on a night out.
articles.content: Married NFL coach Urban Meyer was caught on camera dancing with another woman on a night out.
